text: Mam ay sɨkop, mɨñɨl takaw agjunɨg, Nɨbi mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb agebin. Nɨbi Klays binɨb ne yonɨgun agɨl, kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl yenɨmɨb. Takaw tep ak penpen agñɨl gos sek yenɨmɨb. Gos pal nokom nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Kɨmɨgel jɨmñɨl yenɨmɨb. Anɨgem nɨm, God ne nɨbop mapen lɨl, gek kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨpɨm ak, nɨb ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgab.
